name: School Days Simulator
storyline:
You are Makoto, the new student at Japanese High School simulator. In your first day at school, you will meet many new friends, and also enemies. You can date any girls or boys in the school, except the bad guys. Meet Sakura the tsundere class rep, Rin the cheerful girl, Misaki the quiet girl, or your senpai the handsome boy in the class. The story begin when you meed to join one of the club in the school to gain reputation and eventually date one of your friends. On the other hand, Every day you will also be faced with situations that make you feel different emotions.
For example, feeling happy because you managed to date with your dream schoolgirl, feelings of anger because meeting annoying schoolmates and fight with them, or the feeling of fear because you have to solve a mystery in a tense situation.
summary: The high school is full of cute and adorable students! Make many friends on your first day at school, beat the bad student and eventually you will be falling in love with someone there. Which one do you want to be inside your heart?
